channel.title: talk on Leipzig Gophers
channel.description: Recent content in talk on Leipzig Gophers

item.title: Talk Proposals
item.description: Talk Proposals Thanks for your interest in giving a presentation at Leipzig Gophers, we appreciate your input. As for topics, we are interested in anything related to the Go programming language, including its uses, e.g. in the cloud and infrastructure domain, best practices, experiences from real world projects, and other topics. In the past, we had presentations on a wide range of topics, from langauge features, concurrency, networking, container technology, machine learning, tools, testing, security, databases, and much more.

item.title: State of Go at Leipzig Software Craft June 2022 Meetup
item.description: We will be talking about the State of Go in 2022 at the classic and incredible Leipzig Software Craft Meetup (née Softwerkskammer) in June 2022. Go is 12 years old at this point in time. The last years brought quite a few changes into the Go ecosystem and language and we want to highlight some of those, specifically: Generics Go Modules and dependency management Ecosystem developments and more … Who, when and where?
